contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox River | river_name = Altmühl | image_name = Panorama altmuehltal6.jpg | caption = | origin = [[Middle Franconia]] | mouth = [[Danube]]<br>{{Coord|48|54|37|N|11|54|25|E|display=inline,title}} | basin_countries = [[Germany]] | length = ±220 km | elevation = | discharge = | watershed = | image_map = Altmuehl2.gif | map_caption = Map with the Altmühl highlighted }} The '''Altmühl''' is a river in [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]]. It is a left tributary of the River [[Danube]] and is approximately 230 kilometres in length. ==Overview== [[File:Essing Altmühl2009 P1020203.jpeg|thumb|left|Old Altmühl at Essing, between Dietfurt and Kelhheim]] The source of the Altmühl is located close to the city of Ansbach. From here the river runs southeastwards as a narrow brook to enter the Altmühlsee (a lake) north of [[Gunzenhausen]]. After leaving Gunzenhausen the river describes a broad curve through the [[Frankish Alb]]. It enters the '''Altmühl Valley Nature Park''', which is famous for its natural beauty: The [[meander]]s of the Altmühl River have cut deep gorges into the mountains of the Frankish Alb. The Altmühl passes the cities of [[Treuchtlingen]], [[Eichstätt]] and [[Beilngries]]. After [[Dietfurt]] the river bed was straightened and integrated into a canal connecting the [[Main (river)|River Main]] and River Danube (the [[Rhine-Main-Danube Canal]]). In spite of protests by conservationists{{cn|date=July 2012}} the canal was opened in 1992 and has changed much of the eastern Altmühl Valley. The Altmühl finally meets the Danube in [[Kelheim]]. ==See also== *[[Altmühltal]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://donauinseln.blogspot.com/2012/11/traces-of-mighty-paleo-danube-in.html Traces of a mighty paleo-Danube in the Altmühl Valley] {{commonscat-inline|Altmühl}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Altmuhl}} [[Category:Altmühl basin| ]] [[Category:Rivers of Bavaria]] [[Category:Tributaries of the Danube]] [[Category:Federal waterways in Germany]] {{Germany-geo-stub}} {{Europe-protected-area-stub}}
